title: geth unable to sync testnet Morden
body:
Version: 1.3.0-dev
Git Commit: 57ab1473887b4eaeac2ec6912e3d738d4839b48a

tried to get the chain from Morden, getting:

```
I1027 00:37:30.386295    1594 backend.go:332] Protocol Versions: [63 62 61], Network Id: 2
I1027 00:37:30.387164    1594 genesis.go:89] Genesis block already in chain. Writing canonical number
I1027 00:37:30.387237    1594 backend.go:344] Successfully wrote genesis block. New genesis hash = c31c07282c5f803da583b8b65f3aa0b5cce411f3ffa6ae11c5e0adb3e057ef4a
I1027 00:37:30.387922    1594 genesis.go:89] Genesis block already in chain. Writing canonical number
I1027 00:37:30.388011    1594 backend.go:380] Blockchain DB Version: 3
I1027 00:37:30.388356    1594 blockchain.go:189] Last header: #0 [c31c0728…] TD=131072
I1027 00:37:30.388392    1594 blockchain.go:190] Last block: #0 [c31c0728…] TD=131072
I1027 00:37:30.388406    1594 blockchain.go:191] Fast block: #0 [c31c0728…] TD=131072
I1027 00:37:30.404663    1594 cmd.go:124] Starting Geth/v1.3.0-dev-57ab1473/linux/go1.5.1
I1027 00:37:30.404881    1594 server.go:311] Starting Server
I1027 00:37:32.990293    1594 udp.go:204] Listening, enode://7eda046cc8180bc56d9d16483e5870628094fe2a8bdfe524de45b09f5f17cb897500a4e28ce0c78513eb7b506cc141a6a5845dbb249e4b0ef9ec0cc6acc5ead0@[::]:30303
I1027 00:37:32.990467    1594 backend.go:598] Server started
I1027 00:37:32.990725    1594 ipc_unix.go:109] IPC service started (/home/user/geth.ipc)
I1027 00:37:32.990794    1594 server.go:552] Listening on [::]:30303
I1027 00:38:52.991084    1594 downloader.go:289] Block synchronisation started
I1027 00:48:45.486789    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: block body download canceled (requested)
I1027 00:48:59.163417    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: state data download canceled (requested)
I1027 00:49:09.658922    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: state data download canceled (requested)
I1027 00:51:52.178428    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: no peers to keep download active
I1027 00:52:29.744087    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: block body download canceled (requested)
I1027 01:00:02.953065    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: no peers to keep download active
I1027 01:04:07.710831    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: block body download canceled (requested)
I1027 01:04:15.018511    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: state data download canceled (requested)
I1027 01:04:25.318228    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: state data download canceled (requested)
I1027 01:04:37.506778    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: block header download canceled (requested)
I1027 01:04:45.930389    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: state data download canceled (requested)
I1027 01:04:57.270587    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: block body download canceled (requested)
I1027 01:05:08.620327    1594 downloader.go:269] Synchronisation failed: state data download canceled (requested)
```

(switching to Frontier has no issues getting the chain)

I'm looking into this, but I've yet to find an operational Morden peer. I guess most people run their own privat test net for development purposes, so the official one isn't too popular any more. Will try to dig up something though to answer this issue properly.
We've added a few more seed servers, should be operational now, hopefully without any hiccups. Fixed via https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/1952 .
